introduction.who_we_are: The Biji-biji Initiative is an environmentally focused organization founded in June 2013 by a group of eco-conscious individuals. Central to its mission is the cultivation of changemakers through social and environmental impact accelerator programs. By facilitating access to education and innovative solutions, Biji-biji seeks to reinforce the larger sustainability ecosystem.

values.title: ARTICULATE INTENTIONS THROUGH ACTION AND INNOVATION
values.description: To be purposeful in all we do, to drive towards a common good.

values.title: PRACTICE RESILIENCE AND PERSEVERENCE
values.description: To embrace change and challenges with grace and grit.

values.title: EMBODY HUMILITY AND AUTHENTICITY
values.description: To be kind, real, and true to oneself and one another in any situation.

values.title: BE BOLD AND CREATIVE IN BREAKING BOUNDARIES
values.description: To think beyond the norm in problem-solving and reaching greater heights.

values.title: STAND FOR INCLUSIVE AND SUSTAINABLE GROWTH
values.description: To always strive for growth, individually and collectively, for humanity and the environment.

logo_usage.logo_requirement: The logo must feature prominently in all visual communications, standing alone without amalgamation with other symbols or graphics.
logo_usage.prominently_displayed: Position the logo on the cover or at the outset of visual communications, maintain clear space, and adhere to minimum size for visibility.
logo_usage.primary_logo_required: Required on all print media, advertising, websites, other media, and external communications.

spelling.initiative_singular: Initiative is singular and should not include an s.
examples: Biji-Biji Initiative - Only first biji is capitalized

restrictions: Do not stray from the color palette.
Do not rearrange elements of the logo.
Do not stretch or distort the logo.
Do not change the orientation of the logo.
Do not use drop shadows when reproducing the logo.

color.note: Avoid placing the logo on surfaces with deeper colors for visibility.

logo_usage.white_space: Maintain x-space and y-space when scaling the logo.

position.note: Use isolation zone rules for readability and recognition.
position.watermark_requirement: Watermark must be added to all photos posted on social media and shared with the public, including press.

logo_usage.email_signature: This e-mail signature must be used by every member of staff at Biji-biji.

negative_space.video_note: Provide enough negative space so platform navigation bars do not interfere with content.

digital_content.margin_bleed: Use proper margins to give breathing room to readers. For print materials, include bleed to avoid white strips after trimming.

canvas_export.note: Use a 2x canvas to reduce compression loss, export at standard sizes.
